resources.string: You must grant permission to read contacts. This permission is necessary for the full operation of the application: reading contact data, including their events. If you have denied access to read contacts, if necessary, allow it in the phone settings in the section "Applications -> Permissions".

You must provide permission to write to contacts. This permission is necessary for the full operation of the application: changes to contact data, including their events. If you have denied access to record contacts, if necessary, allow it in the phone settings in the section "Applications -> Permissions".
